description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, defining the app's root widget, home page, and basic UI structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state for MyHomePage.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for rendering the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage.
